parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: (string) The name of the scope to list secrets within.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: Lists the secret keys that are stored at this scope.  This is a metadata-only operation; secret data cannot be retrieved using this API.  Users need the READ permission to make this call.
